title: When Datacard is connected to  computer, how can I confirm the USB Modem has been successfully installed?
answer:
You may confirm it in Device Manager:
? Open “Control Panel”.
? Select “System”
? Open “Hardware”, select “Device Manager”
? Unfold the Modem and ports. After the dashboard install well ,you can check the information in device manager of you computer named "HUAWEI Mobile Connect"
